articles.description: Chelsea manager Frank Lampard is confident Timo Werner will be back amongst the goals again despite enduring the joint longest goal drought of his career.
articles.content: The 23-year-old -- who cost Chelsea £53 million ($A96 million) when they signed him from RB Leipzig in the summer -- failed to score in the 3-0 win over West Ham on Monday taking his run without scor… [+1943 chars]
